channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M25
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M25

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A282 northbound between A296/A225 and A206 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M25 anti-clockwise between junctions J1B and J1A, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to carriageway resurfacing closing three lanes. Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.title: M25 anti-clockwise within J11 | AntiClockwise | Roadworks
item.description: On the M25 anti-clockwise at junction J11, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks closing three lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.
